verbose_text: When we performed ChIP of Eaf3-HA on ECM33, a gene that does not show a splicing defect in the absence of H3K36me, we did not observe a significant decrease in Eaf3-HA occupancy, suggesting that loss of Eaf3 on an ICG may be correlated with a decrease in splicing of that ICG (XREF_FIG, left).
